title: Person Of Interest || What do you become then ? (Season 1)
author: Real Scorsese
comment: Well if the 21st June this year is your final POI fan vid, I cannot wait to see it. However, I have a very strong feeling you won't be able to stay away and for the POI fan's sake, I hope that's true. If you don't do anymore vids, don't be a stranger, jump on Facebook, Twitter and especially the Reddit group and say hello to us. I am so very proud of the Person of Interest subreddit, there is never a shortage of some kind of great conversation going on there, and this is when I pop in once every week or so. The most common are new viewers who are working their way through the show or have finished and want to share their thoughts. Those posts never get old.
Haha - I thought you were done with PoI? Can't let go - as we all are
description: Here is the first montage of the month of may on POI, concerning season one. Do you like it? Then there will be the second, and so on... Until the fifth season for a special video on June 21st.
